name: PassageWestBaptist
0:
”Alexa, open passage west baptist”
”Alexa, ask passage west baptist for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start passage west baptist”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: passage west baptist
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Passage West Baptist. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to sermons you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current sermon. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
